doc.previous: Clearly the term is of interest However it like the intrinsic derivative is not necessarily on the manifold Therefore we can define the Riemann tensor to be the projection back onto the manifold
doc.after: Lastly if F is of grade r then we can define interior and exterior covariant derivatives as
